poster: G o g g l e s
title: Getting 20 minute banns for the next 5 games because i dodged a couple of games from trolls
body: Im kinda confused of why we get punished for dodging? Especially when you dodge because of trolls, fights or instalocks. Now i have this 20 minute wait because l did my team a favour...

replies.body:
Better to get a short wait for dodging than to dodge and get queued with the same trolls again because you queued straight away.

Dodging isn't how Riot wants you to deal with problem players.

You're meant to play a ruined game with them so you have a reason to report them so their behaviour is caught by the tribunal that doesn't exist.

If you just dodge and that was what they wanted their negative behaviour is reinforced.

Players need to learn that their behaviour is wrong and will be punished, or they will continue to act like two year olds because they're getting away with it.

Couldn't have put it better myself dude.

I'd like to add...

Also to count the amount of times the enemy has "Honored" my allied 5th pick for "Freelo" in a ranked game, all because he wouldn't support and/or trolled/afk'd all game.

Some people don't realize that if they don't report people doing the wrong thing, they are going to end up on your team OR WORSE...
They will never be punished and the behavior will continue, because as Jakiron said... You're reinforcing that behavior.

If you see someone doing something crappy on the enemy team, report them, or they just might end up on your team next time.

I think this is a completely mixed back of apples when it comes down to it. If you know someone is going to be a troll and grief for no good reason, 
The whole team which the troll is on gets penalized.

1. Its no fun for the team.
2. If playing ranked the whole loose LP (possibly get demoted or a failed promotion)

Just today i had a guy in ranked who said if he didn't get mid he would feed. Someone else chose mid, but then for the benefit of the team he went support. The guy who wanted mid got mid but decided to feed anyway, needless the say the game was not fun.

I get a lot of this kind of stuff. (probably because i am stuck in bronze because of this kinda stuff). We don't see the outcome of reporting, because we continue to see this crap happen, and instead of 1 player being punished, 5 players get punished in some form.

The current system doesn't work. It doesn't deter bad behavior at all, so something has to change.

It would have to be repetitive dodging, so I guess that is pretty bad luck, but imagine why people may be, for instance, instalocking.
I have been in games where people have dodged like three times in a row, so I have to keep going back into the queue. If that happened to someone else and they got frustrated, maybe they would be less inclined to be rude. You might be avoiding the toxicity, but the way you do it might be part of the cause.
